articles.title: Texas flash floods leaves cars almost underwater
articles.description: Parts of the Dallas, Texas area received a summer's worth of rain overnight.
articles.content: With some areas of Dallas, Texas receiving record-breaking rainfall, drivers on a flooded interstate 30 were forced to abandon their vehicles and get to safety.
